en-EN.explore_empty_title:
Start downloading
videos on explore page!
en-EN.explore_empty_subtitle:
Your downloads in queue will appear
here, so you can manage them!
en-EN.search_empty_title:
Oops, we couldn't find
a result for you!
en-EN.search_empty_subtitle:
Try doing another search, changing
filters or trying something different!
en-EN.search_hint:
Use the search bar above, you can
filter the search with "tags" for more
exact results.
en-EN.dark_theme_desc: Change the app theme to Dark
en-EN.download_path_desc: Select the path for the downloaded videos
en-EN.search_limit_desc: Set the limit of widgets when searching videos
en-EN.search_placeholder: Search a YouTube video or input a link...
en-EN.update_available_subtitle: Check our GitHub to download the latest release of this project.
